title: E40 and Too Short
itunes:title: E40 and Too Short
description:
Today on the show we had E40 and Too Short call in where they announced their Verzuz Battle, spoke on Bay Area Influence, Snoop Dogg Collabs and more. Also, they had friend to the show Michael Eric Dyson who spoke on social redemption, redefining defund the police, his new book and more. Also, we flashed back to when Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to Trump advisor for mistaking Charalamagne as a rapper.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
